## ThirdwebSDK.getCustomContractFromAbi() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

Get an instance of a Custom contract from a json ABI

**Signature:**

```typescript
getCustomContractFromAbi(address: string, abi: ContractInterface): CustomContract<import("contracts").ThirdwebContract>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type              | Description                          |
| --------- | ----------------- | ------------------------------------ |
| address   | string            | the address of the deployed contract |
| abi       | ContractInterface | the JSON abi                         |

**Returns:**

[CustomContract](./sdk.customcontract.md)&lt;import("contracts").ThirdwebContract&gt;

the contract
